@philip_l_g wrote:

put that with you ints

public int kills = 0;

add this to your commands:

 else if (command.startsWith("killcount")) {
				sendMessage("things killed: "+kills);

that Should work i dunno? i tryed to add it to my server but i forgot why i logged in lol!
